Title: Saral WPF
Description:
Saral is a Framework to ease the development of WPF client application. 
It facilitates development of application using PRISM/Composite Application Block and MVVM Design Pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Saral is a Framework to ease the development of WPF client application.
It facilitates development of application using PRISM/Composite Application Block and MVVM Design Pattern.


The initial version of this Framework provides infrastructure to display ShowMessage(), OpenFileDialog() and SaveFileDialog() from Model or ViewModel layer of MVVM design pattern

http://technovivek.blogspot.com/2010/08/display-message-box-and-file-open-save.html

SaralCommand (not in released version but checked-in in code)

http://technovivek.blogspot.com/2010/08/simplified-icommand-implementation-in.html


It’s an Open Project without any funding, liability and restriction. Let’s keep up the spirit of developer community

Join the Saral development team : http://technovivek.blogspot.com/2010/08/saral-framework-development-team-join.html
